Patches.Name: HRTFSound
Patches.Author: SF94
Patches.Description: Sets DirectSound to use more advanced algorithms to process 3D sounds. This patch is unnecessary when BASS for SFX is enabled.

Patches.Name: KeepCamSettings
Patches.Author: VeritasDL & SF94
Patches.Description: Fixes a vanilla bug that prevents Free Cam Settings from being saved properly when dying or loading a zone/act.

Patches.Name: FixVertexColorRendering
Patches.Author: SF94
Patches.Description: Vanilla SADX ignores built-in object vertex colors and uses the material color instead. This patch reimplements functions to process vertex colors correctly.

Patches.Name: MaterialColorFix
Patches.Author: PkR
Patches.Description: This loops through all models in the game and replaces their material colors with white. This fixes various inconsistencies and makes the models look more like they do in the Gamecube and Dreamcast versions of the game.

Patches.Name: NodeLimit
Patches.Author: Sora
Patches.Description: SADX originally has a limit of 111 nodes per object for models and animations. This patch increases the limit to 255, enabling the integration of more modern and complex models into the game.

Patches.Name: FOVFix
Patches.Author: SF94
Patches.Description: Improves the field of view and allows for vertical/portrait resolutions/dimensions.

Patches.Name: SkyChaseResolutionFix
Patches.Author: PkR & SF94
Patches.Description: Makes Sky Chase work the same way at all screen resolutions. This fixes Tornado and reticle movement, as well as enemy fire rate. Obtaining score for emblems at resolutions higher than 640x480 is easier with this patch than in the vanilla game.

Patches.Name: Chaos2CrashFix
Patches.Author: Sora
Patches.Description: Fixes a vanilla bug where beating Chaos 2 and restarting the boss was crashing the game.

Patches.Name: ChunkSpecularFix
Patches.Author: Exant
Patches.Description: Fixes Specular Color property on Chunk Models.

Patches.Name: E102NGonFix
Patches.Author: SF94
Patches.Description: Fixes N-sided polygons (Gamma's headlight) by using a triangle strip vertex buffer.

Patches.Name: ChaoPanelFix
Patches.Author: Kell
Patches.Description: Fixes the UI Panel for Chao Stats to display properly.

Patches.Name: PixelOffSetFix
Patches.Author: SF94
Patches.Description: Fixes subpixel misplacement of most 2D elements that can be noticed at higher resolutions.

Patches.Name: LightFix
Patches.Author: Exant, Kell & SF94
Patches.Description: Fixes incorrect light selection on levels and enables light type preservation for queued models.

Patches.Name: ExtendedSaveSupport
Patches.Author: PkR
Patches.Description: Enables support for saved games from the Steam version and allows custom save names up to 48 characters.

Patches.Name: CrashGuard
Patches.Author: PkR
Patches.Description: Prevents common crashes with missing textures and missing binary files. This will not prevent the game from crashing in all circumstances.

Patches.Name: XInputFix
Patches.Author: PkR
Patches.Description: Fixes spinning camera with XInput controllers when Vanilla Input is used. This patch is unnecessary with SDL Input.
